version_description:
• Customize Home Screen - You can now choose which tiles will appear on your Home Screen for easy access to your favorite areas! Set up your personalized home screen on the Settings page.
• Improved Card Activity Display
• Other Bug Fixes

• Customize Home Screen - You can now choose which tiles will appear on your Home Screen for easy access to your favorite areas! Set up your personalized home screen on the Settings page.
• Improved Card Activity Display
• Other Bug Fixes
Usability enhancements.
Usability enhancements.
Added version in Spanish now available.
Added version in Spanish now available.

On the Card Activity screen the fee summary now displays Year to Date Fees and Prior Month Fees. Additionally, under Search Activity the date range search functionality now offers a Month/Year selection option (up to 12 previous months).

On the Card Activity screen the fee summary now displays Year to Date Fees and Prior Month Fees. Additionally, under Search Activity the date range search functionality now offers a Month/Year selection option (up to 12 previous months).

• Bug fixes

• On the Card Activity screen the fee summary now displays Year to Date Fees and Prior Month Fees. Additionally, under Search Activity the date range search functionality now offers a Month/Year selection option (up to 12 previous months).
• Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
New SSL certificate
New SSL certificate

New features include:

Reset password notification – To help you prevent getting locked out, we’ll prompt you to reset your password following an incorrect username/password combination.

Show/Hide Password – Cut down on the guesswork. You can now show and hide the password field when logging in.

Share your feedback – Have an idea or comment? We’ll ask you for feedback every so often, which helps us improve the app experience and add features you want.

New features include:

Reset password notification – To help you prevent getting locked out, we’ll prompt you to reset your password following an incorrect username/password combination.

Show/Hide Password – Cut down on the guesswork. You can now show and hide the password field when logging in.

Share your feedback – Have an idea or comment? We’ll ask you for feedback every so often, which helps us improve the app experience and add features you want.
Biometric login-use your face or fingerprint for a more secure login experience. Locked out? You can now unlock your account in the app.
Biometric login-use your face or fingerprint for a more secure login experience. Locked out? You can now unlock your account in the app.

Stay informed with pending and completed transactions, now viewable in your account overview. We made updates on Authentication code – For your security, we’ll send you an authentication code when logging in on a new device.

Stay informed with pending and completed transactions, now viewable in your account overview. We made updates on Authentication code – For your security, we’ll send you an authentication code when logging in on a new device.

New Updates include:

Insights: Stay informed with useful information about your account activity.
User Interface Enhancements: We have made enhancements to the login page to highlight the "Activate New Card" & "Check My Card Status" features.

Daily Transaction Limits – For your protection, we limit certain types of transactions from occurring more than usual.
Transfer alerts – Get up-to-date information about your transfers and associated fees, if your program allows.

Transfer alerts – Get up-to-date information about your transfers and associated fees, if your program allows.
Card replacement – Replace lost, stolen or damaged cards quickly and easily from within the app.

General Bug Fixes and Improvements
General Bug Fixes and Improvements
The all-new U.S Bank Reliacard® Mobile App makes it even easier to manage your money. It's personalized, quick, offers options for alerts, and helps to protect you from fraud.
